verses.name: Luke 14:32
verses.text: Or else, while the other is yet a great way off, he sendeth an ambassage, and desireth conditions of peace.

verses.name: Luke 14:33
verses.text: So likewise, whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath, he cannot be my disciple.

verses.name: Luke 14:34
verses.text: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be seasoned?

verses.name: Luke 14:35
verses.text: It is neither fit for the land, nor yet for the dunghill; but men cast it out. He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.
